Header.title: Every Player, everywhere
Header.paragraph: Using NFTs to create a permanent record of athletic participation, awards, and skills.

About.paragraph: Aletico lets players use NFTs to track and globally showcase their skills.
Why: Create a permanent record of athletic accomplishments

Services.name: Proof of Play
Services.text: Proof of Play NFTs track participation in games and tournaments.

Services.name: Proof of Awards
Services.text: Proof of Awards NFTs track awards, accolades, and other atheletic accomplishments.

Services.name: Proof of Statistics
Services.text: Proof of Statistics NFTs tracks athletic statistics.

Features.title: Athletes
Features.text: Athletes collect and record NFTs for competitions, awards, and statistics.

Features.title: Coaches
Features.text: Coaches create teams hand out participation and award NFTs and record player statistics.

Features.title: Parents
Features.text: Parents create a permanent, globally accessible record their children's sports history.

Features.title: Programs and Sponsors
Features.text: Sports services organizations provide their coaches and athletes with a permanent record of participation.
